NAME: 343 Sansome St
SEATING_No: 18 chairs, 50 linear seats on planter box sizes.
LOCATION: 15th floor terrace, and on top of the "old office tower" (could be one and the same). Also behind the building Leidesdorff Street, the street is closed during lunch hours
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This fifteenth floor open space has excellent views of surrounding buildings and streets, as well as the San Francisco Bay. It has various types of seating and landscaping. It also has art in the form of a large sundial.

NAME: 120 Howard St
LOCATION: interior courtyard between the building and the building adjacent to the east
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This space features plants along the entirety of the snippet and is served by an espresso cart.

NAME: 100 1st St
HOURS: Ground level arcade space accessible at all times, Sun Terrace open during daylight hours.
SEATING_No: 30 seats at 10 tables plus numerous areas to sit along built-in benches and planters, grassy areas.
LOCATION: Sun Terrace is on second floor above adjoining parking garage SE of main building. Ground level arcade is on Mission Street side.
SOURCE: SPUR, DT Plan 2009, Motion
Descriptio: The large Sun Terrace features extensive landscaping and seating. Several art sculptures are featured, along with an elevated view of the street below. There is a 'grand' staircase (snippet) up to the Sun Terrace. Ground level arcade in front of building

NAME: Commercial Street (235 Pine Entitlement)
TYPE: lunchtime conversion. Commission was satisfied that it met the guidelins.
LOCATION: commercial street between montgomery and sansome
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: Linear park improvements along Commercial Street feature various types of trees and concrete linear seating. These spaces are served by many cafés and restaurants along Commercial Street. Additional seating is provided during lunch hours.

NAME: 555 California St
SEATING_No: Yes- 24 small wooden benches located at elevated plaza's eastern edge.
LOCATION: Located at the elevated plaza along California Street.

NAME: 222 2nd St
LOCATION: Ground floor lobby
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: An enclosed open space, with operable floor to ceiling windows and doors; located within the street-level lobby.

NAME: 71 Stevenson St
Descriptio: The open space connects Stevenson Street and Jessie Street, including planter boxes, a water fountaing, and seating with table outside the cafe.

NAME: 535 Mission
SEATING_No: Yes- Five benches with a seating capacity of 46
Descriptio: Pedestrian-only alleyway connecting Mission and Minna Streets.

NAME: 50 Beale St
Descriptio: Large well landscaped plaza with many seating options.

NAME: Embarcadero Center West 1, 2, & 3
TYPE: Pedestrian walkway on ground and 2nd levels
SEATING_No: 30 tables, 107 chairs, plus planter-side seating, benches.
LOCATION: Commercial Street between Drumm and Sansome
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List, Motion
Descriptio: Commercial Street throughout Embarcadero 1, 2, and 3 is a pedestrian mall on ground floor and 2nd level, which is accessed by an elaborate staircase system, flanked by waterfalls. Fountains, foliage, art work, and bench seating found throughout.

NAME: 1 Kearny St
LANDSCAPIN: Hedges and other types of plants.
LOCATION: Rooftop (11th floor)
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This rooftop terrace has extensive views of Market St. as well as rooftop architecture of nearby buildings. Landscaping and bench seating support this space.

NAME: Foundry Square SW
SEATING_No: Café-style seating with booths and tables
LOCATION: Near main building entrance facing the outdoor POPOS.
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List

NAME: 525 Market St
SEATING_No: 9 tables with movable chairs; ledge seating; seating along terraced stairs and artificial turf patch.
FOOD_SERVI: Restaurants located adjacent to Open Space.
LOCATION: Located along Market Street, at the building's side just southwest of main entrance.
Descriptio: This is a two level open space, with granite wall water fountains at the sidewalk level near Market Street and a view to the landscaped space on the second level.

NAME: 199 Fremont St
SEATING_No: Rock planter box seating. Approx 114 linear seats plus 17 iondividual rocks
LOCATION: On the howard street frontage
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This large plaza space features extensive rock landscaping and artwork. There are two adjoined areas, one of which has food service.

NAME: Empire Park
LANDSCAPIN: Water fountain and lots of plants and shade.
SEATING_No: 15 chairs w/ tables, 8 bench seats in the park, 8 along commercial.
FOOD_SERVI: There is food service serving the commercial street POPOS, but not directly serving that of Empire park.
LOCATION: Along commercial street and at 642 commercial st
SOURCE: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
Descriptio: Empire park, located at 642 Commercial, is an urban garden that features a water fountain and landscaping. Along Commercial in front of Empire park, there are many widened sidewalk spaces which have benches and landscaping.

NAME: Marriott Courtyard - B (Starbucks)
LANDSCAPIN: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers
LOCATION: Snippet below grade with stair entry on corner of 2nd & Folsom and wheelchair entry on Folsom.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This open space has a small sitting space below street level on the corner of Folsom and Second, served by a café.

NAME: 611 Folsom St
Descriptio: Brick plaza with some trees, artwork and seating on brick structures.

NAME: 555/557 Market St
Descriptio: Extensive landscaping combined with water features signify this space between two high rises. Seating,however, is only availabe to employees.

NAME: 221 Main St
Descriptio: An open plaza with some seating, landscaping and planters.

NAME: 123 Mission St
LOCATION: plaza in front of the building
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This large plaza features extensive landscaping and art. Seperate seating areas with seating characterize the area.

NAME: Citygroup Center
SEATING_No: Ample seating at tables with movable chairs.
LOCATION: Ground floor
Descriptio: Built with marble, and covered with glass, this greenhouse provides ample seating and tables.

NAME: 505-525 Howard
SEATING_No: Yes - Outdoor chairs, benches in the plaza and seating booths in the "indoor park.
LOCATION: Street level plaza
Descriptio: Street-level outdoor plaza and "indoor park" with seating and a café.

NAME: 100 California St
SEATING_No: None. Stairs? Some planter box seating but doesn't meet linear seating specs (12'' H and 9'' depth
LOCATION: ground level exterior open space in the form of plazas and walkways
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This is a large plaza with planter boxes, along with smaller spaces along Davis Street. There is also space for food service to serve the plaza in the future.

NAME: Marriott Courtyard - A (Starbucks)
LANDSCAPIN: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers
SEATING_No: It appears that one bench near the entrance on 2nd Street is meant to meet this requirement.     Per Thayer:  12 linear seats by bench.
LOCATION: Bench next to entrance setback 15 feet on 2nd Street.  Per Thayer:  Benches on sidewalk setback on Folsom.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: Thayer referenced something that is not part of the open space requirement, this is pedestrian improvement requirement.  Per Thayer:  This open space has benches and landscaping along the sidewalk on Folsom at street level.

NAME: Marathon Plaza
LOCATION: In front of building facing Second Street
SOURCE: SPUR
Descriptio: Large, triangular urban garden facing Second Street with a water feature, ample seating, and lush landscaping. Deli and restaurant open to the park provide food and additional seating.

NAME: 14 Fremont St
Descriptio: This open space is a through walkway between Fremont and 1rst Street that opens into an interior plaza.  A farmers market was operating on location.

NAME: Trinity Alley
LOCATION: Within the public right of way

NAME: 55 Second St - B
SEATING_No: 8 plus benches with tables and chairs
RESTROOMS: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
LOCATION: The urban garden is at the end of anthony street, at the Jessie Street entrance to the building
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This space is located outside the rear entry of 55 Second Street. It has planter boxes that serve as seating throughout the plaza.

NAME: 1 California St
Descriptio: Wrap around plaza area with seating near food services.

NAME: 101 California St
LOCATION: Street level plaza at California and Davis Streets.

NAME: 77 Van Ness Ave
LOCATION: Inside the lobby
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This space is in the front lobby of 77 Van Ness. It has tables and chairs and features a sculpture.

NAME: Foundry Square SE
SEATING_No: 15 chairs, 24 linear seat on  ledge, 45 linear seats on planter boxes sides.
LOCATION: corner of first and howard
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

NAME: Intercontinental Hotel_Pacific Terrace
SEATING_No: Unknown - seating arranged for private event(s)
RESTROOMS: Hotel. Could use the lobby restrooms etc
LOCATION: 4th floor, turn left from elevator bay, walk beyond convention/meeting rooms, turn left
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: The Intercontinental Hotel provides two POPOS on the fourth and sixth floors. They have various seating arrangements and landscaping, each with views of the City.

NAME: 50 California St
Descriptio: Plaza and wrap around walkway with seating along planters.

NAME: 595 Market St
Descriptio: This plaza is located on 2nd. Street and Stevenson. Seating is only available on the steps beyon the table and seating provided for the food establishment.

NAME: Millenium Tower Plaza
Accessibil: Indirect for Atrium. Unknown for Plaza
LOCATION: Ground level.
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This atrium features extensive artwork and is served by a bar/restaurant on the premises. It has various types of seating with tables, and high windows overhead.

NAME: 1 Bush Street
LOCATION: Below street level
Descriptio: This Urban Garden provides a sunken space featuring a water fountain. Space is accessed with stairs from Bush Street and curved walkways from Market street.

NAME: 55 Second St - A
RESTROOMS: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
LOCATION: Located inside the historic building, up a set of 3-4 steps. Can be accessed through the main lobby (walk past the elevator bay) and through entrances from Jessie and Stevenson Streets.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This large, indoor "park" located inside the historia building has a wooden floor, tables with chairs, and large, comfortable leather chairs on a carpeted section near the large window looking out on Stevenson Street.

NAME: 200 California St
TYPE: Public Sitting Area in Pedestrian Walkway
LOCATION: In front of building, sidewalk widening
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This pedestrian seating area is on a widened sidewalk. Pedestrians may sit on linear seating that forms a planter box. There is a small, public sculpture next to the planter box.

NAME: Gap Building
LOCATION: in front of 2 folsom
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This is a large plaza with several seating areas. Art sculptures are featured along with diverse landscaping.

NAME: 350 Mission St
TYPE: Interior open space at ground level, specific type not specified in motion.
SEATING_No: Seating capacity of 85 people with amphitheater stair seating, tables and movable chairs and backless benches
LOCATION: Lobby entrance
SOURCE: POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: An enclosed open space, with operable sliding glass doors that open up to street frontage; located within the street-level lobby.

NAME: 345 California St - East B
SEATING_No: Bench for ~3 people; 10 chairs w/ tables
LOCATION: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B

NAME: Marriott Courtyard - C
TYPE: Interior courtyard area - does not appear to be public (see notes)
LOCATION: inside the hotel courtyard.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This space features extensive landscaping with several art attractions. Comfortable seating arrangements are located throughout the space. Food service nearby inside the hotel.

NAME: 49 Stevenson St
LOCATION: In front of building on Stevenson Street and through a pedestrianized alley to Jessie Street
SOURCE: SPUR
Descriptio: This pedestrian walkway has small fountains and an art sculpture are featured in this space. Plaza seating is available for patrons of Yank Sing restaurant only.

NAME: 1 Post St
Descriptio: Snippets surrounding the hexagonal fence of Montgomery Bart Station sunken plaza. This space include concrete steps with some planter boxes.

NAME: 425 Market St
Descriptio: An open plaza between buildings with benches, trees and some landscape materials.

NAME: 150 California St
SEATING_No: 40 chairs w/ 10 tables, Linear Seating: only 10'' deep, but approx 82 linear seats
LOCATION: 6th Floor
SOURCE: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
Descriptio: This view terrace is located six stories above the street level. There is a large sculpture, long periods of sunlight, and several types of seating. There are extensive views of the surrounding area.

NAME: Spear Street Plaza
LOCATION: Outdoor alleyway off of Spear Street
Descriptio: Well landscaped walkway with seating and tables.

NAME: 345 California St - West C
SEATING_No: Bench for ~3 people; 10 chairs w/ tables
LOCATION: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B

NAME: 135 Main St
SEATING_No: Ample indoor seating: four tables with movable chairs, seven lounge sofas
LOCATION: Located in main lobby waiting area, at building's main entrance.
Descriptio: Interior lobby with seating open business hours only.

NAME: 55 Second St - C
RESTROOMS: Yes, through main lobby at reception desk (ID required)
LOCATION: Entrance from Stevenson Street
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List

NAME: 600 California St
LOCATION: Northwest side of building, up the stairs from California Street beyond an artistic gateway.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: A shady open space area with art in the form of sculptures. This snippet found on the northwest side of the building, up the stairs. It adjoins the open space of the adjacent building.

NAME: 345 California St - A
LOCATION: Plaza in front of building main entrance.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This open space is provided in the form of a large plaza fronting California Street. Additionally, two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The plaza and east snippet are served by restaurant

NAME: 650 California St
Descriptio: This open space is elevated with the street slope. A large art piece represents one entrance to the open space on California Street. This space surrounds the building and offers seating on the ledges of planter boxes.

NAME: 201 Spear St
Descriptio: Plaza with seating along planters.

NAME: 100 Pine St
Descriptio: This Urban Garden is either accessed through the front entrance of the building or a narrow walkway on Front Street. This space offers water fountains, landscaping, and art.

NAME: 444 Market  St
Descriptio: Plaza with no seating.

NAME: 211 Main St
Descriptio: Open plaza with two benches and a gated children's play area through to Spear Street.

NAME: 101 2nd St
SEATING_No: 25 linear seats on bench/  ledge. 23 tables, 69 chairs
RESTROOMS: Yes, through main lobby at reception desk (ID required)
LOCATION: Ground/Mezz level at 2nd/mission
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This greenhouse features large trees, windows, and art. It has two levels of space and is served by a cafe.

NAME: 555 Mission St
LOCATION: Western side of Building, street level.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This large plaza has several art and landscaping features. It is located in front of 555 Mission Streets and runs along the west side of the building. There are several distinct sitting areas with different styles of seating.

NAME: Foundry Square NE
LOCATION: corner of 1st and howard
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This is one of three plazas fronting the intersection of 1st and Howard, forming Foundary Square. It features art sculptures and seating near a cafe.

NAME: Westfield Sky Terrace (Wesfield Center Mall)
FOOD_SERVI: None, but food on the premises
LOCATION: Roof top, 9th floor. Accessible by elevator in 835 Market St (only 1st elevator goes to 9th floor).
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This extensive 9th floor rooftop space looks onto the dome of the mall and has views westward and sunlight. It does not have direct food service, but food may be found in the food court below in the mall.

NAME: 333 Market St
Descriptio: Open plaza with minimal seating on the edge of planters.

NAME: 560 Mission St
SEATING_No: 45 chairs with 15 tables. 134 linear seating on ledges. 10 linear seats on benches
LOCATION: Plaza: NE side of building; indoor park/arcade along anthony st.
SOURCE: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
Descriptio: This large plaza features a sculpture in a pool of water, a large bamboo grove, and various forms of seating. It is served by a cafe.

NAME: 456 Montomery St
Descriptio: This is a sunken plaza, landscaped with flowers and small water fountains. Escalators are provided to this space.

NAME: Intercontinental Hotel_Bay Terrace
RESTROOMS: Hotel. Could use the lobby restrooms
LOCATION: 6th floor, entrance next to elevator bay
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: The Intercontinental Hotel provides two POPOS on the fourth and sixth floors. They have various seating arrangements and landscaping, each with views of the City.

NAME: 77 Beale St
Descriptio: Plaza with high planters that provide some landscaping but no seating.

NAME: 180 Howard St
Descriptio: A cul-de-sac walkway with benches at the end.

NAME: 201 Mission St
Descriptio: Initially hidden from street view there is seating along the building setback area to the right as you walk toward the door.

NAME: 25 Jessie St
Descriptio: This urban garden include a water feature combined with a tall art piece. Seating available on the ledeges of raised water feature.

NAME: Foundry Square NW
SEATING_No: 44 linear seating on ledges, 21 seating on planter box, 7 tables 28 chairs
LOCATION: corner of first and howard
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

NAME: 1 Market St
FOOD_SERVI: Several restaurants and cafes located within One Market Plaza, open M-F business hours
RESTROOMS: Yes, inside One Market Plaza at Mission St. entrance
LOCATION: Located along Mission Street at One Market Plaza entrance.
Descriptio: Plaza located on Mission Street along the rear of the building. Some planters with benches.

NAME: 235 Second St
LANDSCAPIN: bamboo, street trees. Indoor park has bushes.
Accessibil: Direct for plaza. Indirect for indoor park
LOCATION: urban garden: corner of second and clementina, indoor park ground floor.
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This plaza is located on the corner of 2nd St. and Clementina St. It features several types of seating, served by a cafe.

NAME: Rincon Center
SEATING_No: 78 on benches and chairs. Also, the café provides some of its own seating.
LOCATION: in the courtyard between 1 and 2 rincon center
SOURCE: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
Descriptio: This large plaza space is found in the interior courtyard between Rincon Center 1 and Rincon Center 2. It features several art sculptures and different types of seating.

NAME: 301 Howard St
Descriptio: Landscaped seating area located kitty-corner to 301 Howard.

NAME: Redwood Park
Descriptio: This extensively landscaped urban park offers redwood trees at the foot of the Transamerica Pyramid. It features, a tall water fountain, sculptures, and ample seating.

NAME: Golden Gate University
Descriptio: Concrete seating streches along the passage that connects the recessed entrance of Golden Gate University to the sidewalk on Mission Street.
